name: Small Blood Bag
description: A half-liter bag of universal donor blood. This critical resource serves as a vital tool in emergency medical situations, allowing the operator to quickly administer much-needed blood transfusions without the need for blood type matching.

name: Large Blood Bag
description: A one-liter bag of universal donor blood. This critical resource serves as a vital tool in emergency medical situations, allowing the operator to quickly administer much-needed blood transfusions without the need for blood type matching.
